channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Layoffs Can Tank Employee Morale. Here’s How to Help Them
item.description: A new survey of employees who survived company layoffs shows how companies that had to cut staff can stay productive.

item.title: MrBeast used AI to create YouTube thumbnails. People weren’t pleased

item.title: AI-generated ASMR is taking over TikTok, and it’s getting really weird
item.description: On TikTok, an ASMR creator dips a spoon into a bowl of molten-hot lava, brings it to her lips, and eats it like it’s honey. Another creator crunches d...

item.title: ‘No Space for Bezos’ wedding protest turns Venice into ground zero for the overtourism debate

item.title: Here’s What You Need to Know About Gen-Z Workers’ ‘Task Masking’ Tricks
item.description: Younger employees think already differently about the workplace and how you behave in the office. And now they’re pretending to be busy.

item.title: Anthony Pompliano strikes deal to create publicly-traded Bitcoin treasury company
item.description: The company will spend up to $1 billion to establish a Bitcoin treasury.

item.title: 20 Austin Companies That Are Great Places to Work
item.description: All of these companies based in the Austin metro area made Inc.’s 2025 Best Workplaces list.

item.title: HSBC’s return-to-office push risks denting CEO’s savings plan
item.description: The extra real estate costs could hinder the bank in its bid to find $1.5 billion in annual cost savings.

item.title: Iran fires missiles at U.S. air bases in Qatar and Iraq
item.description: Iran launched missile attacks Monday on a U.S. military bases in Qatar and Iraq, retaliating for the American bombing of its nuclear sites and escalat...

item.title: Trump demands ‘everyone’ keep oil prices down after Iran threatens to close Strait of Hormuz following U.S. attack: ‘I’m watching’
item.description: Trump urged stepped-up production as the White House sharpened its warnings to Iran against closing the Strait of Hormuz.

item.title: The Strait of Hormuz is a critical chokepoint for global energy markets, but there are ways to get around it
item.description: About 20 million barrels of oil a day flow through the Strait of Hormuz, or the equivalent of 20% of global petroleum liquids consumption.

item.title: Iran launches missile attack on U.S. base in Qatar as Tehran responds to attack on nuclear sites
item.description: Iran announced on state television that it attacked American forces stationed at Qatar’s Al Udeid Air Base.
